text: Hey all, Its been a while since I last posted. Is there a way to format phone numbers. For example, from an external source we get 07123456789, but we would like to format it so that it shows <tel:+447123456789|+447123456789>. Can this be done via a workflow and does it need a custom code action?

Hey <@U04512YU6GH>

Yes, It is possible with workflow. You can check some examples here and tune it a little bit as per your use case.

<https://www.HubSpot.com/programmable-automation-use-cases?offer=format-international-phone-numbers>
Is there a way to force a CCA that hits the timeout limit to _not_ retry?
